name: Divergent Thinking
description: Systematic generation of multiple creative alternatives and novel solutions

steps.name: Define the Challenge - Clarify the problem space
steps.description: Clearly define the problem or challenge that requires creative solutions

steps.name: Generate Fluent Ideas - Produce many alternatives
steps.description:
Generate as many different ideas as possible without judgment or evaluation

ðŸ§  ENHANCED THINKING REQUIRED: Use the SequentialThinking tool to work through this systematically.

Generate as many different ideas as possible. Don't judge or evaluate - just produce volume. Think of obvious solutions, then stretch beyond them. What are all the different ways this could be approached?

steps.name: Explore Flexible Approaches - Vary categories and types
steps.description:
Deliberately explore different categories, types, and approaches to the problem

ðŸ§  ENHANCED THINKING REQUIRED: Use the SequentialThinking tool to work through this systematically.

Deliberately shift between different categories of solutions. If you've been thinking technically, try social solutions. If you've been thinking about tools, try processes. What completely different types of approaches exist?

steps.name: Elaborate Creative Details - Add original elements
steps.description:
Develop ideas with original, creative, and unexpected details

ðŸ§  ENHANCED THINKING REQUIRED: Use the SequentialThinking tool to work through this systematically.

Add creative, original details to your ideas. What would make each idea unique, unexpected, or novel? How could you combine ideas in original ways? What creative twists could you add?

steps.name: Capture All Possibilities - Document the idea space
steps.description: Document the full range of generated possibilities for later evaluation
